description:
This course is about being awesome in Excel. This will take you MS Excel skills to the next level. This is a collection of professionally record videos which are to the point and short.

Each video is about one trick which is generally unknown but is very useful.

This course is result of my huge experience of working as an analyst in big companies. I know which are the challenges that are faced on a regular basis and this course aims at making you aware of methods you can use to solve all these challenges.

This course takes a case by case approach where a problem is presented and a solution is demonstrated. There is no sequence to follow, just watch what you like and become awesome in Excel.
title: Rarely Used but Very Useful Excel Tricks
